original_title: Central Bank Amendment Bill to be taken up for debate next week
original_body_lines: The Central Bank Amendment Bill was fixed for debate in Parliament on May 11 from 9.30 am to 6.00 pm, the Communications Department of Parliament said.
An adjournment debate moved by the opposition on the X-press Pearl disaster is fixed for May 10 from 9.30 am to 6.00 pm.
